description.value: You know how to make a larger creature hurt when it falls to the ground. If you successfully @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Trip]{Trip} a foe that's larger than you, it takes [[/r 1d8[bludgeoning]]] damage (or [[/r 2d8[bludgeoning]]] damage on a critical success). If you are master in Athletics, the damage increases to [[/r 2d8[bludgeoning]]] damage (or [[/r 4d8[bludgeoning]]] damage on a critical success).
